Plot: Pancho Bustamante wakes up after being 27 years in coma, now he is 47 but with a mind of a 20-year old person, and trying to get Rafaela, the woman he loves, but now she is with Jano, Pancho's best friend.
Title: 20añero a los 40
Actors: Francisco Pérez-Bannen, Tamara Acosta, Pablo Macaya, Fernanda Urrejola
